name: Egg Drop Soup
description: A simple, soothing Chinese soup made with beaten eggs poured into simmering chicken broth, seasoned with green onions and white pepper.
steps: Bring chicken broth to a simmer in a pot.
Season the broth with soy sauce, salt, and white pepper.
Slowly pour beaten eggs into the simmering broth, stirring gently to form ribbons.
Garnish with chopped green onions and a few drops of sesame oil.
tips: Pour the eggs slowly and stir in one direction for finer egg threads.
Adjust the seasoning after adding the eggs to avoid overpowering the delicate flavor.
Serve immediately to enjoy while the egg strands are at their most tender.
